title.narrative: Feasibility Study - Timor-Leste Airline Business Plan Feasibility Study, through Peoples Partners and Associates, LLC

description.narrative: This additional funding supports an independent, third-party desk study review of invoices and interim deliverables associated with a feasibility study for the Special Administrative Region of O-Cusse Ambeno (Regio Administrativa Especial de O-Cusse Ambeno) in Timor-Leste to achieve three interrelated objectives: the primary objectives are 1) the development of a business plan to establish a new airline in Timor-Leste that would service the Special Administrative Region of O-Cusse (an exclave separated from the rest of the country); 2) the establishment of this new airline; and a secondary objective is 3) the development of a critical connectivity link to the rest of the world for passengers and cargo, provided by the newly proposed airline. The study would review Timor-Leste's current and potential commercial aviation market, develop a detailed business case and provide a roadmap for estaliblishing the airline. As Timor-Leste is an underconnected market, the creation of a new airline would greatly increase connectivity for passengers and cargo.

activity-date.narrative: Date unavailable. Calculated start date is the earliest transaction date

person-name.narrative: Amy Swers and Liz Sutton; Ryan Boles
